inclusion.criterion: The subject is scheduled for elective unilateral TKA
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: The subject is ≥ 18 years and ≤ 80 years;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The subject's weight is between 70-120 kg;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patient agrees to receive an adductor canal block.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject is < 18 years of age or >80 years of age;
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is known or believed to be pregnant;
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Symptomatic untreated gastroesophageal reflux or otherwise at risk for perioperative aspiration;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any condition for which the primary anesthesia care team deems neuraxial anesthesia inappropriate;
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient's age and medical history may make neuraxial anesthesia inappropriate. Unknown if patient agrees to receive adductor canal block or meets ASA class criteria.
